changeSet.sql:
update message_template set modified_date='2013-03-22', body = 'Summary: Early Alert Course: $earlyAlert.courseName Early Alert Created Date: $earlyAlert.createdDate Response Created by: $earlyAlertResponse.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlertResponse.createdBy.lastName Response Details: Outcome: $!earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertOutcome.name #foreach( $earlyAlertOutreach in $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertOutreachIds ) Outreach: $earlyAlertOutreach.name #end #foreach( $earlyAlertReferral in $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertReferralIds ) Referral: $earlyAlertReferral.name #end Comment: $earlyAlertResponse.comment ' where id = 'b528c1ac-6104-435b-ae62-08eb4f7ee2f9' AND (body = '

$!termToRepresentEarlyAlert DETAILS

Faculty Member$earlyAlert.createdBy.fullName
Faculty Office Location$!earlyAlert.createdBy.staffDetails.officeLocation
Faculty Phone Number$!earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone
Course$!earlyAlert.courseName
Title$!earlyAlert.courseTitle

Referral Reasons:

    #foreach( $earlyAlertReferral in $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertReferralIds )
  • $earlyAlertReferral.name
    • #end

Faculty suggestions:

    #foreach( $earlyAlertSuggestion in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertSuggestionIds )
  • $earlyAlertSuggestion.name
    • #end
#if( $earlyAlert.comment )

******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlert.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************

#end

Email generated by $!institutionName $!applicationTitle $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert

');
